attributes.action: Enclosed Dog Park To Be Built In Gorton
attributes.additional_details: Dog owners and non doggy people are often at logger heads over the issue of dogs running loose and, on occasion, unsupervised.For the safety of both dogs and people i propose that there should be organised Dog Parks. Enclosed areas where well behaved dogs are allowed off lead to run and play, under supervision. the field next to vine street park would be perfect for this.
